adHeader: ALL TYPES DECKING/// Redwood, Ipe, Trex, Tigerwood...
adDetails: I am a lic. GENERAL CONTRACTOR with over 30 years exp. I have been building decks/covers/fences/gazebos in the bay area for over 30 years! I have the same phone # for 35 years! I have hundreds of satisfied custumers that call me back to do additional projects. I do all the work myself from start to finish! I also do ADDITIONS, KITCHEN AND BATHROOM REMODELS. I do one job at a time ! If you are thinking about starting a new project, I give free quotes. Small jobs are O.K. Call show contact info ask for MARK Licensed bonded and insured AAArating by the BBB ALSO: Roofs : new and repairs Siding : new and repairs Electrical : new and repairs Framing all types Windows : new and repairs Hardwood floors new and repairs Custom Cabintry/ kitchen cabinets Thank you for reading this post!
